attributes.action: hold a proper enquirey as to why the poor innocent baby "P" was allowed to die
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am starting this petition ,I feel totally sickend and appalled that a poor innocent child was abused in such a horrific way and that no body in social services have been held accountable for their actions and neglect of the care of this child .He was known to them and seen over 60 or more times and yet he still died from horrific injuries .The mother herself has been reported to have said to friends " I will be home for christmas" poor baby"P" may not have had the right love and support when he was alive but he has got it now .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
